04/20/2022 18:56:50 The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134277 for more information. 04/20/2022 18:56:50 Executed DbCommand ("55"ms) [Parameters=["@__p_1='500', @__p_0='0'"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT `t0`.`Id`, `t0`.`Description`, `t0`.`Identifier`, `t0`.`Name`, `t2`.`Id`, `t2`.`CustomerNumber`, `t2`.`Identifier`, `t2`.`Level`, `t2`.`Name`, `t2`.`OrganizationNumber`, `t2`.`ParentId`, `t2`.`TenantId`, `t2`.`Id0`, `t2`.`CustomerNumber0`, `t2`.`Identifier0`, `t2`.`Level0`, `t2`.`Name0`, `t2`.`OrganizationNumber0`, `t2`.`ParentId0`, `t2`.`TenantId0`, `t2`.`Id00`, `t2`.`CustomerNumber00`, `t2`.`Identifier00`, `t2`.`Level00`, `t2`.`Name00`, `t2`.`OrganizationNumber00`, `t2`.`ParentId00`, `t2`.`TenantId00`, `t2`.`Id000`, `t2`.`CustomerNumber000`, `t2`.`Identifier000`, `t2`.`Level000`, `t2`.`Name000`, `t2`.`OrganizationNumber000`, `t2`.`ParentId000`, `t2`.`TenantId000`, `t2`.`Id0000`, `t2`.`CustomerNumber0000`, `t2`.`Identifier0000`, `t2`.`Level0000`, `t2`.`Name0000`, `t2`.`OrganizationNumber0000`, `t2`.`ParentId0000`, `t2`.`TenantId0000`
FROM (
    SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Description`, `t`.`Identifier`, `t`.`Name`
    FROM `Tenants` AS `t`
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS `t0`

                SELECT `o2`.`Id`, `o2`.`CustomerNumber`, `o2`.`Identifier`, `o2`.`Level`, `o2`.`Name`, `o2`.`OrganizationNumber`, `o2`.`ParentId`, `o2`.`TenantId`, `o3`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `o3`.`CustomerNumber` AS `CustomerNumber0`, `o3`.`Identifier` AS `Identifier0`, `o3`.`Level` AS `Level0`, `o3`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `o3`.`OrganizationNumber` AS `OrganizationNumber0`, `o3`.`ParentId` AS `ParentId0`, `o3`.`TenantId` AS `TenantId0`

        ) AS `t3` ON `o0`.`Id` = `t3`.`ParentId`
    ) AS `t1` ON `o`.`Id` = `t1`.`ParentId`
    WHERE `o`.`Level` = 0
) AS `t2` ON `t0`.`Id` = `t2`.`TenantId`

    WHERE `o`.`Level` = 0

            FROM `Organizations` AS `o1`
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT `o2`.`Id`, `o2`.`CustomerNumber`, `o2`.`Identifier`, `o2`.`Level`, `o2`.`Name`, `o2`.`OrganizationNumber`, `o2`.`ParentId`, `o2`.`TenantId`, `o3`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `o3`.`CustomerNumber` AS `CustomerNumber0`, `o3`.`Identifier` AS `Identifier0`, `o3`.`Level` AS `Level0`, `o3`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `o3`.`OrganizationNumber` AS `OrganizationNumber0`, `o3`.`ParentId` AS `ParentId0`, `o3`.`TenantId` AS `TenantId0`
                FROM `Organizations` AS `o2`
                LEFT JOIN `Organizations` AS `o3` ON `o2`.`Id` = `o3`.`ParentId`
            ) AS `t4` ON `o1`.`Id` = `t4`.`ParentId`
        ) AS `t3` ON `o0`.`Id` = `t3`.`ParentId`
    ) AS `t1` ON `o`.`Id` = `t1`.`ParentId`

05/02/2022 21:22:40 The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results.
